## Announcement
The Ministry of Electricity, Water, and Renewable Energy <orig>وزارة الكهرباء والماء والطاقة المتجددة</orig> announces the issuance of the tenders listed below. Tender documents can be obtained electronically from the website https://eprocurement.mew.gov.kw.
- **Issuance Date**: 20/7/2025
- **Closing Date**: 12/8/2025
- **Document Price**: As mentioned on the website and in the attached table.
- **Initial Deposit**: As mentioned on the website and in the attached table, valid for 90 days in favor of the Ministry of Electricity, Water, and Renewable Energy <orig>وزارة الكهرباء والماء والطاقة المتجددة</orig> and is non-refundable.

- **A valid certificate of compliance with the national labor percentage, issued by the Ministry of Social Affairs and Labor <orig>وزارة الشئون الاجتماعية والعمل</orig>, must be attached to the bid.**
- **Bids must be submitted with a certificate from the Kuwait Chamber of Commerce and Industry <orig>غرفة تجارة وصناعة الكويت</orig> stating the company's registration for the year 2025/2026.**
- **Documents must be placed in sealed envelopes, stamped with red wax, clearly marked with the tender number and subject, and deposited in the bid box located at the Procurement and Supplies Department in the main building of the Ministry of Electricity, Water, and Renewable Energy <orig>وزارة الكهرباء والماء والطاقة المتجددة</orig> in South Surra, Sixth Ring Road, Ground Floor.**
- **This announcement is an integral part of the tender documents.**
- **For additional information and other conditions, please visit the website of the (Ministry of Electricity, Water, and Renewable Energy <orig>وزارة الكهرباء والماء والطاقة المتجددة</orig> - Procurement Department) https://eprocurement.mew.gov.kw**

# Ministry of Finance <orig>وزارة المالية</orig>
## Announcement of the Sale of an Aluminum Pile - Iron Pile by Sealed-Bid Auction
### Auction No. (2484)
The Ministry of Finance <orig>وزارة المالية</orig> announces the sale of an aluminum pile - iron pile by sealed-bid auction at the Kuwait Municipality <orig>بلدية الكويت</orig> according to the following details:
1- Location for receiving the terms booklet and auction participation offer: Kuwait Municipality <orig>بلدية الكويت</orig> - Financial Affairs Department, from 27/7/2025 until 31/7/2025. The documents will be delivered for a non-refundable fee of (30) Dinars <orig>دينار</orig>, to be paid at the Kuwait Municipality <orig>بلدية الكويت</orig> cashier.
At the time of receiving the terms booklet, the bidder will sign a declaration and pledge to adhere to the specified deadline for submitting the bid to the Central Sales Committee <orig>لجنة البيع المركزي</orig> at the Ministry of Finance <orig>وزارة المالية</orig>.
2- Inspection Date: (5) working days from 27/7/2025 to 31/7/2025.
Inspection Time: During official working hours from 8:00 AM to 11:00 AM.
3- Location for receiving those wishing to inspect the auction items: Shuwaikh Industrial Area <orig>منطقة الشويخ الصناعية</orig> (General Warehouses Department).
4- Date for submitting bids and opening envelopes:
- Bids are to be submitted on Tuesday, 05/08/2025, at the Ministry of Finance <orig>وزارة المالية</orig> - Ministries Complex <orig>مجمع الوزارات</orig> - Block 12 - Third Floor - General Warehousing Affairs Department <orig>إدارة شؤون التخزين العامة</orig> - Central Sales Section <orig>قسم البيع المركزي</orig>, according to the time specified for the bidder by the Kuwait Municipality <orig>بلدية الكويت</orig> (No bid will be accepted after the specified time for the bidder has passed).
- Envelopes will be opened and the auction held on Wednesday, 06/08/2025, at the Ministry of Finance <orig>وزارة المالية</orig> - Ministries Complex <orig>مجمع الوزارات</orig> - Block 12 - Third Floor - General Warehousing Affairs Department <orig>إدارة شؤون التخزين العامة</orig>.
- The winning bidder will be announced on the Ministry of Finance <orig>وزارة المالية</orig> website on Wednesday, 06/08/2025.
- Checks will be returned to unsuccessful bidders on Thursday, 07/08/2025.
- The certified check / bank guarantee must be submitted in the name of the Kuwait Municipality <orig>بلدية الكويت</orig>.
- Special Auction Conditions:

# Public Authority for Minors Affairs <orig>الهيئة العامة لشئون القصر</orig>
## Announcement
The Public Authority for Minors Affairs <orig>الهيئة العامة لشئون القصر</orig> announces its desire to issue Tender No. (1 - 2025/2026) concerning the maintenance of communication devices and WIFI networks at the Public Authority for Minors Affairs <orig>الهيئة العامة لشئون القصر</orig> for the year 2025/2026.
The tender documents will be available for collection starting from Sunday, 27/07/2025.
Companies wishing to participate in this tender should visit the Authority to receive the relevant documents for a non-refundable fee of 20 K.D. (fees are to be paid via K-Net) at the following address: Al-Mirqab <orig>المرقاب</orig> – Abdullah Al-Mubarak Street – next to the Public Institution for Social Security – Eighth Floor – Finance Department.
The timeline for the tender will be as follows:

<table_caption>Tender Schedule for WIFI Network Maintenance</table_caption>
<table>
| No. | Day | Date | Description |
|---|---|---|---|
| 1 | Sunday | 27/07/2025 | Tender Issuance |
| 2 | Monday | 04/08/2025 | Preliminary meeting at 11:00 AM at the Information Systems Center, Second Floor, at the Authority's headquarters |
| 3 | Thursday | 14/08/2025 | Deadline for bid submission at 12:00 PM |
</table>

Bids must be submitted in a sealed envelope to the address mentioned above, ensuring the following documents are attached with the bid:
1- A registration certificate from the Central Agency for Public Tenders <orig>الجهاز المركزي للمناقصات العامة</orig>.
2- A certificate from the Commercial Register from the Kuwait Chamber of Commerce and Industry <orig>غرفة تجارة وصناعة الكويت</orig> for the year 2025.
3- A bank guarantee issued by a Kuwaiti bank, equivalent to 2% of the bid value, as an initial deposit.
4- A "To Whom It May Concern" certificate issued by the Public Authority for Civil Information <orig>الهيئة العامة للمعلومات المدنية</orig>.
5- A certificate of compliance with national labor quotas issued by the Public Authority for Manpower <orig>الهيئة العامة للقوى العاملة</orig>.
6- A tax exemption certificate issued by the Ministry of Finance <orig>وزارة المالية</orig>.

Director General <orig>المدير العام</orig>

|:---|:---|:---|:---|:---|
| | 20/7/2025 | 3/8/2025 | 75 Kuwaiti Dinars <orig>دينار كويتي</orig> | (1500 K.D.) One thousand five hundred Kuwaiti Dinars <orig>دينار كويتي</orig> only, in the form of a certified check or a letter of guarantee valid for (90) days in favor of the Public Authority for Sport <orig>الهيئة العامة للرياضة</orig> from the closing date. |
| Preliminary Meeting (Inquiry Session) | 11:00 AM on Monday, 28/7/2025, at the Public Authority for Sport <orig>الهيئة العامة للرياضة</orig> (First Floor). |

Bids must be submitted from 9:00 AM until 2:00 PM on the closing date. Bids must be delivered in red wax-sealed envelopes and placed in the designated tender box at the Authority's headquarters (Second Floor). Any bids received after the specified deadline for the tender closing will not be accepted.
- Bidders must adhere to the instructions for submitting bids (CD) on the Public Authority for Sport's <orig>الهيئة العامة للرياضة</orig> website (Pas.gov.kw/tenders).
- Companies/bidders wishing to submit inquiries, clarifications, or other requests must do so at the time and place specified in the preliminary meeting schedule (inquiry session) above. No inquiries will be considered after this deadline.
- All documents must be submitted on a (CD) and a non-reproducible hard copy, with the exception of the bid form and the initial guarantee, which must be submitted as a hard copy.
- Bids shall be valid for a period of (90) ninety days from the date of bid opening. Any bid not accompanied by the original or a copy of the receipt for the purchase of the tender documents, the initial guarantee, and the national labor support certificate issued by the Public Authority for Manpower <orig>الهيئة العامة للقوى العاملة</orig> for the year 2025 will be disqualified.
- The bidder must attach a valid "To Whom It May Concern" certificate issued by the Public Authority for Manpower <orig>الهيئة العامة للقوى العاملة</orig> stating that there are no holds on the bidder's file regarding government contracts registered with the Authority, nor any of the violations mentioned in Article (10) of Law No. 8 of 2010 concerning work in the private sector. It should be noted that any bid not including this certificate will be disqualified.
- The bidder must attach a valid "To Whom It May Concern" certificate issued by the Ministry of Electricity, Water, and Renewable Energy <orig>وزارة الكهرباء والماء والطاقة المتجددة</orig> stating clearance of consumption debts.
- The tender is open to all companies and institutions specialized in the required works and registered with the Public Authority for Sport <orig>الهيئة العامة للرياضة</orig> and the Central Agency for Public Tenders <orig>الجهاز المركزي للمناقصات العامة</orig> for the year 2025, for a fee of (75 K.D.) seventy-five Kuwaiti Dinars <orig>دينار كويتي</orig> only, payable via K-Net (non-refundable except in cases stipulated by the Ministry of Finance circulars). The following must be brought:
  1- A copy of the tender announcement in the Official Gazette.
  2- A copy of the company's registration with the Authority for the year 2025.
  3- A written authorization letter approved by the Authority, accompanied by (a copy of the Civil ID – a copy of the signature authorization).
- Owners of small and medium enterprises are exempt from the fees for purchasing the tender documents, in accordance with the provisions of Article (39) of Law No. 74/2019 regarding amendments to the Public Tenders Law No. (49/2016).
- Owners of small and medium enterprises wishing to participate in the tender must attach to their bid a valid certificate issued by the National Fund for Small and Medium Enterprise Development <orig>الصندوق الوطني لرعاية وتنمية المشروعات الصغيرة والمتوسطة</orig>, confirming their accreditation as a small or medium enterprise.

In accordance with the provisions of Article (48) of the Public Tenders Law No. (49 of 2016), which states, "Bid envelopes shall be opened at the time and place specified in the tender documents in a public session in the presence of the bidders or their representatives."
- This announcement serves as an invitation for interested bidders to attend. Companies wishing to attend the bid opening session have the right to coordinate with the competent committee one day before the session is held.
- This announcement is an integral part of the tender documents.
- Note: The Authority may cancel the tender without stating reasons and without any objection from the bidders.
- For more information, please visit the website of the Public Authority for Sport <orig>الهيئة العامة للرياضة</orig> (Pas.gov.kw).

## Announcement
The Public Authority for Sport <orig>الهيئة العامة للرياضة</orig> announces the issuance of Tender No. H.A.R (31/2025/2026) concerning the maintenance of the technical support system and license renewal (CONTROL DESK) via sealed envelopes, in accordance with the terms and specifications contained in the tender documents. These documents can be obtained from the Services and Procurement Department – Tenders and Practices Section / Ground Floor, Office No. (5) at the Authority's headquarters in the Al-Riqqa'i <orig>الرقعي</orig> area during official working hours, or through the Public Authority for Sport's <orig>الهيئة العامة للرياضة</orig> website (Pas.gov.kw/tenders).

<table_caption>Tender Details for Control Desk System Maintenance</table_caption>
<table>
| Issue Date | Closing Date | Document Price | Initial Guarantee |
| :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- |
| 20/07/2025 | 31/07/2025 | 75 Kuwaiti Dinars <orig>دينار كويتي</orig> | (K.D. 1,500) only one thousand five hundred Kuwaiti Dinars <orig>دينار كويتي</orig>, in the form of a certified check or a letter of guarantee valid for a period of (90) days in favor of the Public Authority for Sport <orig>الهيئة العامة للرياضة</orig> from the closing date. |
</table>

A preliminary meeting for bidders has been scheduled at the Authority's headquarters (Ground Floor) at 11:00 AM on Sunday, 27/07/2025.
Bids must be submitted from 9:00 AM until 2:00 PM on the closing date. Bids must be delivered in red wax-sealed envelopes and placed in the designated box for tenders at the Authority's headquarters (Ground Floor). Any bids received after the specified deadline for the tender closing will not be accepted.
- Bidders must adhere to the instructions for submitting bids (CD) on the Public Authority for Sport's <orig>الهيئة العامة للرياضة</orig> website (Pas.gov.kw/tenders).
- Companies/bidders wishing to submit inquiries, clarifications, or other requests must do so at the time and place specified above in the preliminary meeting schedule (inquiry session). No inquiries will be considered after this time.
- All documents must be submitted on a (CD) and a non-reproducible hard copy, with the exception of the bid form and the initial guarantee, which must be submitted as a hard copy.
Bids shall be valid for a period of (90) ninety days from the date of bid opening. Any bid not accompanied by the original or a copy of the receipt for the purchase of the tender documents, the initial guarantee, and the national labor support certificate issued by the Public Authority for Manpower <orig>الهيئة العامة للقوى العاملة</orig> for the year 2025 will be disqualified.
- The bidder must attach a valid "To Whom It May Concern" certificate issued by the Public Authority for Manpower <orig>الهيئة العامة للقوى العاملة</orig> stating that there are no holds on the bidder's file regarding government contracts registered with the Authority, nor any of the violations mentioned in Article (10) of Law No. 8 of 2010 concerning work in the private sector. Please be advised that any bid that does not include this certificate will be disqualified.
- The bidder must attach a valid "To Whom It May Concern" certificate issued by the Ministry of Electricity, Water and Renewable Energy <orig>وزارة الكهرباء والماء والطاقة المتجددة</orig> stating clearance of consumption debts.
The tender is open to all companies and institutions specialized in the required works and registered with the Public Authority for Sport <orig>الهيئة العامة للرياضة</orig> and the Central Agency for Public Tenders <orig>الجهاز المركزي للمناقصات العامة</orig> for the year 2025, for a fee of (K.D. 75) only seventy-five Kuwaiti Dinars <orig>دينار كويتي</orig>, payable via K-Net (non-refundable except in cases stipulated by the circulars of the Ministry of Finance <orig>وزارة المالية</orig>). The following must be brought along: -
1- A copy of the tender announcement in the Official Gazette.
2- A copy of the company's registration with the Authority for the year 2025.
3- A written authorization letter approved by the Authority, accompanied by (a copy of the Civil ID – a copy of the signature authorization).
- Owners of small and medium enterprises are exempt from the fees for purchasing the tender documents, in accordance with the provisions of Article (39) of Law No. 74/2019 regarding amendments to the Public Tenders Law No. (49/2016).
- Owners of small and medium enterprises wishing to apply for the tender must attach to their bid a valid certificate issued by the National Fund for Small and Medium Enterprise Development <orig>الصندوق الوطني لرعاية وتنمية المشروعات الصغيرة والمتوسطة</orig>, confirming their accreditation as a small or medium enterprise. This is in accordance with the provisions of Article (48) of the Public Tenders Law No. (49 of 2016), which states, "Bid envelopes shall be opened at the time and place specified in the tender documents in a public session in the presence of the bidders or their representatives."
- This announcement serves as an invitation for interested bidders to attend. Companies wishing to attend the envelope-opening session have the right to coordinate with the competent committee before the day of the session.
- This announcement is an integral part of the tender documents.
Note: The Authority may cancel the tender without stating reasons and without any objection from the bidders.
- For more information, please visit the website of the Public Authority for Sport <orig>الهيئة العامة للرياضة</orig> (Pas.gov.kw)

# Public Authority for Anti-Corruption <orig>الهيئة العامة لمكافحة الفساد</orig>
## Announcement
The Public Authority for Anti-Corruption <orig>الهيئة العامة لمكافحة الفساد</orig> announces the issuance of Tender No. (03 – 2025 / 2026) concerning the supply of licenses for a security information and event management (SIEM) system, intrusion prevention, internal network protection, and the provision of technical support to the Authority.
Companies wishing to participate may obtain the documents from the Financial Affairs Department – Ground Floor at the building of the Public Authority for Anti-Corruption <orig>الهيئة العامة لمكافحة الفساد</orig> in Al-Shamiya <orig>الشامية</orig>, Block (2), Annex (1), during official working hours, starting from Sunday, 27/07/2025, for a non-refundable fee of (75 K.D.) (only/ seventy-five Kuwaiti Dinars <orig>دينار كويتي</orig>).
Bids shall be submitted to the headquarters of the Public Authority for Anti-Corruption <orig>الهيئة العامة لمكافحة الفساد</orig> located in Al-Shamiya <orig>الشامية</orig>, accompanied by a preliminary security of (2,000 K.D.) in the form of an unconditional letter of guarantee or a certified check issued by one of the approved local banks in the State of Kuwait. It must be valid for the entire duration of the offer's validity. Offers shall be valid for a period of (90) ninety days from the date of unsealing their respective envelopes. Bids are to be placed inside a single envelope sealed with red wax, addressed on the outside to the Public Authority for Anti-Corruption <orig>الهيئة العامة لمكافحة الفساد</orig>, stating the subject as indicated above, while avoiding the bidder's name or any identifying marks. The deadline for submitting offers is 1:00 PM on Thursday, 14/08/2025.
All bidders participating in this tender must attend the preliminary meeting, which will be held at 10:30 AM on Tuesday, 05/08/2025, at the headquarters of the Public Authority for Anti-Corruption (Nazaha) <orig>الهيئة العامة لمكافحة الفساد (نزاهة)</orig> – Al-Shamiya <orig>الشامية</orig>. The bidder is considered bound by the minutes of the meeting and all documents of this tender, whether they attend this meeting or not.
Secretary-General

# General Administration of Customs <orig>الإدارة العامة للجمارك</orig>
## Announcement
The General Administration of Customs <orig>الإدارة العامة للجمارك</orig> announces its desire to engage real estate appraisal offices to evaluate the real estate assets (land and buildings) of the General Administration. Those interested in applying should contact the Secretariat of the Procurement Committee at the headquarters of the General Administration of Customs <orig>الإدارة العامة للجمارك</orig> in the Shuwaikh <orig>الشويخ</orig> area – Jamal Abdel Nasser Street – behind Gulf Bank – Building No. (7), Projects Department – Office No. (48), during official working hours, no later than (30) days from the date of this announcement's publication in the Official Gazette (Kuwait Today / Al-Kuwait Al-Youm <orig>الكويت اليوم</orig>).
Appraisal offices wishing to participate are required to adhere to the following:
- Provide a letter stating that the office is accredited by the Ministry of Commerce and Industry <orig>وزارة التجارة والصناعة</orig>.
- Provide proof of contracts with government entity/entities for asset valuation.
- Provide a copy of the National Labor Support certificate.
- A copy of the Civil Information certificate.
- Contact numbers
- For inquiries, please contact the Secretariat of the Procurement Committee at (24955573).
Controller of the Secretariat of the Procurement Committee

## Announcement (77/2025)

The holder of the following license has applied to the Municipality:

<table_caption>License Holder Details for Announcement 2025/77</table_caption>
<table>
| Trade Name | Trust Engineering for Contracting and Trading Company <orig>شركة ترست الهندسية للمقاولات والتجارة</orig> |
|---|---|
| Category | Municipality Contractor, Category C |
| Registration No. | 7200157 |
</table>

requesting the release of the company's bank guarantees deposited with the Municipality against its classification.
Based on Article (19) of Municipality Resolution No. (161/2009) concerning the classification, licensing, and registration of building and demolition contractors in Kuwait Municipality <orig>بلدية الكويت</orig>, which stipulates that a contractor may submit a request to the Municipality to cancel their registration before its expiry or to cancel their classification, and the committee stipulated in the first article of these regulations may issue its decision to that effect after fulfilling the following two conditions: -
1- The contractor has completed all contracted works.
2- The lapse of (15) fifteen days from the date of publishing this request in the Official Gazette.
The cancellation of the license or registration shall result in the return of the bank guarantee submitted by the contractor, taking into account the last paragraph of Article (10) of this resolution. Accordingly, the Municipality appeals to anyone who has any claims against the aforementioned contractor in respect of building construction contracts concluded between them that have not yet been completed, or judicial attachments in their favor due to violating contracting works or dues arising from the construction contract, to contact the Contractors Section at the Engineering Systems Department within a maximum period of fifteen days from this date. The Municipality will not consider any claims submitted to it after the specified period.

**Director General of the Municipality**

# Announcement 80/2025
Tender for Auction No. 10-2025/2026 for the license to utilize a space in the Kuwait Municipality branch building in Mubarak Al-Kabeer Governorate to provide printing and photocopying services for visitors.
Kuwait Municipality <orig>بلدية الكويت</orig> announces the above-mentioned auction, for the license to utilize a space in the Kuwait Municipality branch building in Mubarak Al-Kabeer Governorate <orig>محافظة مبارك الكبير</orig> to provide printing and photocopying services for visitors.

Those wishing to participate in this auction should visit the Kuwait Municipality (Administrative Building, Seventh Floor – Tenders and Auctions Monitoring Department) during official working hours to obtain the auction documents for a fee of KWD 50/- (only fifty Kuwaiti Dinars <orig>دينار كويتي</orig>), which is non-refundable under any circumstances. Owners of small and medium enterprises accredited by the National Fund for Small and Medium Enterprise Development are exempt from this fee.
The bidder must inspect the service delivery site with due diligence before the date of the preliminary meeting to enable bidders to raise their inquiries at the preliminary meeting to ensure transparency.
The preliminary meeting with the bidders who have obtained the auction documents will be held at ten o'clock in the morning on Tuesday, 12/8/2025, at the Municipality branch building in Mubarak Al-Kabeer Governorate. Companies and institutions must present the receipt for payment of the prescribed fee along with a letter from the company or institution authorizing their attendance at the preliminary meeting.
All companies submitting their bids in the auction must send a representative to attend the public session for opening the bid envelopes submitted in the auction, scheduled for Monday, 18/8/2025. Please note that in case of non-compliance with attendance, the Municipality will not bear any responsibility.
Bids must be submitted in sealed envelopes, stamped with red wax, with the auction number and subject written on them. The bidder's name or any identifying marks should not be written on the envelope. They should be placed in the designated box at the Kuwait Municipality (Administrative Building, Seventh Floor – Tenders and Auctions Monitoring Department) no later than twelve o'clock noon on Monday, 18/8/2025, which is the deadline for accepting bids. A preliminary deposit of not less than 2% (two percent) and not exceeding 5% of the bid value must be enclosed with the bid.
If you wish to visit the Municipality, please make an appointment by visiting the link:
www.baladia.gov.kw
For the Director General of the Municipality

## Announcement
Regarding the Booklet of Documents and Conditions for the Auction of Gold Bars at Kuwait Oil Tanker Company
Reference No: SM – 02/2025
Document No. (1-1)

These documents can be obtained from the Commercial Group – Fifth Floor – at the company's General Administration Building headquarters in the Shuwaikh Administrative Area <orig>الشويخ الإدارية</orig> – Plot (A) – Jamal Abdel Nasser Street – next to the State Audit Bureau <orig>ديوان المحاسبة</orig>, during the company's official working hours from (07:00) seven AM until (03:00) three PM, Sunday to Thursday of each week, for a non-refundable fee of K.D. 5/- (only five Kuwaiti Dinars <orig>دينار كويتي</orig>). National Bank of Kuwait – Main Branch – Kuwait
Account No: 1000307805
IBAN: KW49NBOK0000000000001000307805
SWIFT: NBOKKWKW

- To purchase these documents, it is required to submit the official papers of the company/establishment (Commercial License – Chamber of Commerce Certificate for the year 2025 – Authorized Signatory certified by the Kuwait Chamber of Commerce and Industry <orig>غرفة تجارة وصناعة الكويت</orig> – Articles of Association <orig>عقد التأسيس</orig> – Certificate of fulfillment of the Kuwaiti labor percentage in non-governmental entities issued by the Ministry of Social Affairs and Labor <orig>وزارة الشئون الاجتماعية والعمل</orig>, valid for one year in accordance with the Council of Ministers <orig>مجلس الوزراء</orig> Decision No. 1104/Fifth for the year 2008 and any amendments thereto regarding the determination of national labor percentages in non-governmental entities).

### Inspection Date
- Sunday, 03/08/2025 (Kuwait Oil Tanker Company Main Building – Shuwaikh).
From 09:00 AM until 02:00 PM.

### Reception Location for Those Wishing to Inspect
- The company's main building.

## Submission of Bids:
- 02:00 PM on Monday, 11/08/2025. Bids are to be placed in the Bid Box (A) – Ground Floor – Kuwait Oil Tanker Company – Shuwaikh Administrative Area – Jamal Abdel Nasser Street. Please note that any bid submitted after this deadline will be rejected.

- Those wishing to inspect the materials subject to the auction must send a letter by fax to: 24625025 – 24625527, no later than Wednesday, 30/07/2025, to specify the names of the authorized persons for each bidder to inspect these materials and their personal data, ensuring that their number does not exceed (2) two.
